Test Name: CRAB (Candida rugosa Acidic Base) IgG Antibody Detection
Purpose: To detect and quantify CRAB IgG antibodies in patient serum samples for diagnostic assessment.
Container: Serum collection tube (e.g., red-top or serum separator tube)
Equipment: Microplate reader (450/620 nm), ELISA washer, calibrated micropipettes, vortex mixer, timer, plate sealers, 96-well microplates
